newsitem.title: POLAND: ZLOTY CLOSES JUST UP VS BASKET AFTER BALANCED DAY.
newsitem.headline: ZLOTY CLOSES JUST UP VS BASKET AFTER BALANCED DAY.

text.p: 1310 GMT - The Polish zloty closed just up at 2.41/2.34 percent from the trading band centre against Thursday's 2.38/2.31 percent after tracking dollar/mark moves and balanced buy and sell orders from foreign and domestic participants.

Dealers said that an early pro-zloty sentiment drove it to intraday highs close to 2.5 percent from the parity rate resistance and then the zloty lost ground on fear of an intervention after the central bank began checking prices.
* It closed at 2.9995/15 to the dollar, up from 3.0010/30 on Thursday and at 1.8358/73 to the mark, down from 1.8358/73.
* O/N at 21.60/21.80 pct vs opening's 21.50/21.60 pct.
* T/N at 21.67/21.87 pct vs opening's 21.60/21.80 pct.
* NBP refrained from open market operations on Friday.
